alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey; Green; Larue; Marion; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:56AM EST until January 12 at 9:15AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EST/815 AM CST/ FOR EASTERN GREEN...EASTERN LARUE...SOUTHERN MARION...TAYLOR...SOUTHWESTERN BOYLE...WESTERN CASEY AND NORTHERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 856 AM EST/756 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lebanon to near Greensburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Campbellsville, Greensburg, Bradfordsville, Peytons Store, Absher, Arista, Fry, South Campbellsville, Romine and Exie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Casey; Green; Larue; Marion; Taylor
